title: "Untether AI tethers compute cores inside memory array"
excerpt: "A Canadian startup called Untether AI has built tsunAImi, a PCIe card containing four runA1200 chips which combine memory and distributed compute in a single die. We think the technology is representative of an emerging landscape in which general purpose CPUs are giving way to augmentation by specific application processors,"
